original_text:
Big Fin Bay
Con l’avvicinarsi dell’estate, non c’è nulla di meglio che giocare a Big Fin Bay, la nuova slot di casa Thunderkick che ha come protagonista un Marlin e un vecchio lupo di mare pronto a tutto pur di catturarlo.
Diciamo subito che la grafica di questa slot riprende lo stile dei cartoon e ha come sfondo una baia incantata che ci fa venire voglia di fare un tuffo nell’acqua fresca e assaporare il profumo della salsedine. La griglia di gioco è incorniciata in un telaio di legno e sul lato destro, oltre al logo della slot, sono indicati i modi per vincere.
La consolle si trova in basso, qui si possono trovare le indicazioni riguardanti la nostra scommessa e i tasti per giocare. Un motivetto incalzante ci accompagna durante il gioco, a cui si aggiungono gli effetti sonori che seguono le vincite. Entrambi possono essere disattivati in qualsiasi momento accedendo al menù interno.
Caratteristiche principali della slot machine
Come detto nell’introduzione, Big Fin Bay ha uno schema di gioco variabile, ciò vuol dire che il numero delle righe muta a ogni spin: in un giro possiamo trovare su ogni rullo due simboli, tre simboli e sino a un massimo di sette. Ciò che non cambia invece è il numero dei rulli che è sempre sette.
Si vince associando simboli da sinistra a destra e in caso di più combinazioni su una stessa linea verrà pagata quella con un maggior numero di simboli.
Ci sentiamo di poter dire che questa macchinetta è adatta a tutte le tipologie di giocatori: il gameplay è semplice ma allo stesso tempo molto accattivante, il costo è accessibile a tutti visto che per ogni Spin si può puntare da un minimo di 0,1o € a un massimo di 100 €.
I modi per vincere sono ben 5.040 e i giri automatici vanno da 5 fino a 5.000. La volatilità è alta, si vince meno di frequente ma sempre somme di assoluto livello. Il valore RTP è di 96,14%.
Simboli e funzionalità di Big Fin Bay
Ci sono simboli di basso e di alto livello. I primi, come di consueto, sono quelli che corrispondono alla scala del poker, dal 9 all’asso. A salire troviamo i pesci trofeo di diverso colore e il pescatore.
Il Wild è il Marlin dorato, e oltre a sostituire tutti i simboli, quando si trova in una combinazione vincente si espande su tutto il rullo. Durante il gioco regolare può succedere che si attivi la funzione Mistero, in cui 3 rulli casuali diventano Wild.
L’ancora è il simbolo Scatter e se compare 3 volte sui rulli in uno stesso spin, ci ricompensa con dei giri gratuiti. Il numero dipende dal numero di giri indicati in ogni rullo, che comunque non può superare i 6. Se ad esempio sul secondo rullo è presente il numero 3, sul terzo rullo il numero 5 e sul quarto rullo il numero 6, i giri gratuiti che riceveremo saranno 14. Se durante i giri gratuiti compare un Wild, allora questi crescerà di uno slot e manterrà la nuova dimensione durante i restanti giri. Se si raggiungeranno sette posizioni e tutto il rullo risulterà coperto da Wild, verranno assegnati 3 ulteriori free spins. Nelle partite Bonus le sequenze vincenti sono ben 117.649.

raw_translation.response:
"Big Fin Bay" – A Slot Machine for the Experienced Gambler

As summer approaches, there's nothing better than playing "Big Fin Bay," the new slot machine from Thunderkick that features a Marlin and an old sea wolf willing to do anything to catch it.

Right off the bat, it's important to note that the graphics of this slot machine are reminiscent of cartoons and feature an enchanting bay as the background, making us want to take a dip in the cool water and savor the scent of sea salt. The game grid is framed by a wooden frame and on the right-hand side, in addition to the slot's logo, the ways to win are indicated.

The console is located at the bottom, and here you can find information about your bet and the buttons to play. A catchy tune accompanies us during the game, and it's accompanied by sound effects that follow any wins. Both can be turned off at any time by accessing the internal menu.

Main Features of the Slot Machine

As mentioned in the introduction, "Big Fin Bay" has a variable game scheme, which means that the number of rows changes with every spin: in one spin we can find two symbols, three symbols, and up to a maximum of seven symbols on each reel. However, the number of reels always remains seven.

You win by matching symbols from left to right, and in case of multiple combinations on the same line, the one with the highest number of symbols is paid out.

We can say that this slot machine is suitable for all types of players: the gameplay is simple but also very engaging, and the cost is affordable to everyone, as you can bet from a minimum of 0.10 € to a maximum of 100 € per spin.

There are a total of 5,040 ways to win and automatic spins range from 5 to 5,000. The volatility is high, with less frequent wins, but always with high payouts. The RTP value is 96.14%.

Symbols and Features of Big Fin Bay

There are low and high-level symbols. The first group includes symbols that correspond to the poker scale, from 9 to Ace, while the second group includes trophy fish of different colors and the fisherman.

The Wild symbol is the golden Marlin, and in addition to substituting for all other symbols, when it appears in a winning combination, it expands to cover the entire reel. During regular play, the Mystery function may be activated, in which 3 random reels become Wild.

The anchor is the Scatter symbol, and if it appears 3 times on the reels in the same spin, it rewards us with free spins. The number of free spins depends on the number indicated on each reel, but it cannot exceed 6. For example, if the number 3 is on the second reel, the number 5 on the third reel, and the number 6 on the fourth reel, we will receive 14 free spins. If a Wild symbol appears during the free spins, it grows by one slot and retains its new size for the remaining spins. If seven positions are filled and the entire reel is covered in Wild symbols, three more free spins are awarded. During bonus rounds, the winning sequences are an impressive 117,649.

The game grid is framed by a wooden frame and on the right-hand side, in addition to the slot's logo, the ways to win are indicated.

The console is located at the bottom, and here you can find information about your bet and the buttons to play. A catchy tune accompanies us during the game, and it's accompanied by sound effects that follow any wins. Both can be turned off at any time by accessing the internal menu.

Main Features of the Slot Machine

As mentioned in the introduction, "Big Fin Bay" has a variable game scheme, which means that the number of rows changes with every spin: in one spin we can find two symbols, three symbols, and up to a maximum of seven symbols on each reel. However, the number of reels always remains seven.

You win by matching symbols from left to right, and in case of multiple combinations on the same line, the one with the highest number of symbols is paid out.

We can say that this slot machine is suitable for all types of players: the gameplay is simple but also very engaging, and the cost is affordable to everyone, as you can bet from a minimum of 0.10 € to a maximum of 100 € per spin.

It's a simple but engaging game, suitable for all types of players. The RTP is 96.14%, and the volatility is high, with less frequent wins but high payouts. The game has affordable bet limits ranging from 0.10 € to a maximum of 100 € per spin. There are automatic spins ranging from 5 to 5,000.

Graphics and overall design

Big Fin Bay has impressive graphics that resemble cartoons, and the game is set against an enchanting bay background. The wooden frame surrounds the game grid. The game's console is located at the bottom, and catchy tunes accompany the gameplay. The game also has sound effects that accompany any wins, which can both be turned off at any time. 

Variable game scheme

Big Fin Bay has a variable game scheme, meaning that the number of rows changes with each spin, which adds to the excitement of the game. In one spin, players can find two symbols, three symbols, and up to a maximum of seven symbols on each reel. However, the number of reels always remains seven. 

Symbols and paylines

Big Fin Bay has low and high-level symbols. The former includes the poker scale symbols from 9 to Ace, while the latter includes trophy fish of different colors and the fisherman. Players win by matching symbols from left to right, and in case of multiple combinations on the same line, the one with the highest number of symbols is paid out. During regular play, the Mystery function may be activated, in which 3 random reels become Wild. 

Wild and Scatter symbols

Big Fin Bay's Wild symbol is the golden Marlin, which substitutes for all other symbols, and when it appears in a winning combination, it expands to cover the entire reel. The game's Scatter symbol is the anchor, and if it appears 3 times on the reels in the same spin, it rewards players with free spins. The number of free spins depends on the number indicated on each reel, but it cannot exceed 6. If a Wild symbol appears during the free spins, it grows by one slot and retains its new size for the remaining spins. If seven positions are filled and the entire reel is covered in Wild symbols, three more free spins are awarded. During bonus rounds, the winning sequences are an impressive 117,649.

The console is located at the bottom, and here you can find information about your bet and the buttons to play. A catchy tune accompanies us during the game, and it's accompanied by sound effects that follow any wins. Both can be turned off at any time by accessing the internal menu.

Main Features of the Slot Machine

As mentioned in the introduction, "Big Fin Bay" has a variable game scheme, which means that the number of rows changes with every spin: in one spin we can find two symbols, three symbols, and up to a maximum of seven symbols on each reel. However, the number of reels always remains seven.

You win by matching symbols from left to right, and in case of multiple combinations on the same line, the one with the highest number of symbols is paid out.

We can say that this slot machine is suitable for all types of players: the gameplay is simple but also very engaging, and the cost is affordable to everyone, as you can bet from a minimum of 0.10 € to a maximum of 100 € per spin.

Symbols and Features of Big Fin Bay

There are low and high-level symbols. The first group includes symbols that correspond to the poker scale, from 9 to Ace, while the second group includes trophy fish of different colors and the fisherman.

The Wild symbol is the golden Marlin, and in addition to substituting for all other symbols, when it appears in a winning combination, it expands to cover the entire reel. During regular play, the Mystery function may be activated, in which 3 random reels become Wild.

The anchor is the Scatter symbol, and if it appears 3 times on the reels in the same spin, it rewards us with free spins. The number of free spins depends on the number indicated on each reel, but it cannot exceed 6. If a Wild symbol appears during the free spins, it grows by one slot and retains its new size for the remaining spins. If seven positions are filled and the entire reel is covered in Wild symbols, three more free spins are awarded. During bonus rounds, the winning sequences are an impressive 117,649.
